title: Still Desi At Heart, Priyanka Chopra Loves Eating Aam Ka Aachar With Cheese Sandwich!
text:
No matter how much classy and elegant you try to pretend to be, if you’re a desi, you’ll always remain one. Priyanka Chopra, who has been in the industry for almost two decades now, has achieved a lot. She is not only a businesswoman but she has made a career in Hollywood as well. Raised in middle-class family, are there any middle-class habits still left in her?

olive.qa

She says the middle-class habit she cannot get rid of is eating Aam Ka Aachar with cheese sandwiches. For the unversed, Priyanka Chopra loves Aachar so much that she can eat it with almost anything.

"Aachar with all my food. I have aachar with sandwiches also. So, if you have a cheese sandwhich and you have aam ka aachar, it's epic, like homemade aam ka aachar, you can't have like the mixed pickle,” the 37-year-old actress said.

While Priyanka Chopra says she cannot bargain, she loves shopping on sale. "Saving money is fun. It's fun for everyone."
